3.3.1.commit_description: Update SHA256 / MD5 for Blender 3.3 Linux as upstream appears to have respun that build. Fixes: https://github.com/phoronix-test-suite/phoronix-test-suite/issues/671

3.3.0.commit_description: Update against Blender 3.3 upstream, add Intel oneAPI back-end option.

3.2.0.commit_description: Update against Blender 3.2 upstram, expose Radeon HIP option, switch to using --cycles-device option in recent versions for setting device acceleration.

1.9.1.commit_description: Update download links for Barbershop blend files, old mirror broke.

1.7.1.commit_description: Add macOS support, add more download mirrors.

1.5.1.commit_description: Fix for Blender 2.80 Python API preferences handling for GPU selection.

1.4.0.commit_description: Update against Blender 2.79a, plumb in initial Windows support.

1.1.1.commit_description: Add explicit CPU-only / NONE acceleration option
